definition[0]: a very dangerous or frightening situation
example[0]: At that time Bosnia was standing on the edge of an abyss.
example[1]: The country might plunge into the abyss of economic ruin.
definition[1]: a deep empty hole in the ground
definition[2]: a very big difference that separates two people or groups
example[2]: the gaping abyss between these grand buildings and my own miserable home
